.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_4_testing_plot_5_resilience_reg.py:


Resilience - Regression 
=====================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 8-9

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-17

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import XGB2Regressor

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="BikeSharing", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["yr", "mnth", "temp"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="cnt", task_type="regression", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 18-19

Train model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-21

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(model=XGB2Regressor(n_estimators=100), name="XGB2")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 22-23

Resilience performance against worst sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-24

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_perf", resilience_method="worst-sample", figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_001.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 25-26

Resilience performance against outer sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 26-27

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_perf", resilience_method="outer-sample", figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_002.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-29

Resilience performance against worst cluster scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 29-30

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_perf", resilience_method="worst-cluster", figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_003.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 31-32

Resilience performance against hard sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 32-33

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_perf", resilience_method="hard-sample", figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_004.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_004.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 34-35

Marginal distributional distance between full sample and worst sample with worst-sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 35-37

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_distance", resilience_method="worst-sample", 
                       distance_metric="PSI", alpha=0.3, figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_005.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 30%-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_005.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 38-39

Marginal distributional distance between full sample and worst sample with not None immutable features

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 39-41

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_distance", resilience_method="worst-sample", 
                             distance_metric="PSI", immu_feature="hr", alpha=0.3, figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_006.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 30%-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_006.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 42-43

Marginal distributional distance between full sample and worst sample with worst-cluster scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 43-45

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_distance", resilience_method="worst-cluster",
                       distance_metric="WD1", n_clusters=10, figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_007.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 10-Cluster-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_007.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 46-47

Marginal histogram plot for full sample and worst sample

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 47-49

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_shift_histogram", resilience_method="worst-sample",
                       show_feature="hr", original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_008.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 10%-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_5_resilience_reg_008.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 50-51

Marginal density plot for full sample and worst sample

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 51-53

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="resilience_shift_density", resilience_method="worst-sample",
                       show_feature="hr", original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))
